headline: Microchip Technology (MCHP) Partners With Delta to Innovate Energy Solutions
summary: Microchip Technology (MCHP) has made headlines with a new partnership with Delta Electronics, intending to integrate its Silicon Carbide products into Delta's systems, emphasizing energy efficiency and innovations in sectors like AI and automation. This development, along with other strategic product launches and partnerships during the quarter, likely supported the impressive 93% price increase. The collaborative efforts seem to align well with the current market trends where major indices...

headline: MRVL vs. MCHP: Which Ethernet PHY Transceiver Stock Has an Edge?
summary: Microchip Technology's growing edge in Ethernet PHYs and margin recovery makes it a better choice at present than Marvell Technology.

headline: Microchip Enters into Partnership Agreement with Delta Electronics on Silicon Carbide Solutions for the Future of Power Management
summary: This agreement leverages Microchip’s mSiC™ technology and Delta’s smart energy-saving solutions to accelerate the development of sustainable applicationsCHANDLER, Ariz., July 17, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The growth of artificial intelligence (AI) and the electrification of everything are driving an ever-increasing demand for higher levels of power efficiency and reliability.
